Here are the list of valid commands: PLACE MOVE LEFT RIGHT REPORT ROBOT
For usage please refer to Readme.md file.
Enter any other text to exit.
Enter command: right
No active robot to turn right.
Enter command: left
No active robot to turn left.
Enter command: move
No active robot to move.
Enter command: report
There are no robots on the table.
Enter command: robot 1
No robot is available on the table.
Enter command: dlsf
Command entered is not in the list of valid commands.
Exiting the program.
